```{r}
View(bil)

mean(bil$age_at_doi, na.rm = T)
mean(bil$bp_sys_mean, na.rm = T)
mean(bil$bp_dia_mean, na.rm = T)
```

Subsets disease
```{r}
bil$disease = recode(bil$disease, "1" = "ba", "2" = "tof")

ba = bil %>% filter(disease=="ba")
tof = bil %>% filter(disease=="tof")
```
